name: gans
short_description:
Gans (global area network screens) is a Opensource-Software to control multimedia-content on (client)-computers over the internet.
The Software includes Server- and Clientsoftware and a Webbased Administration Tool.

license.fullpath: License :: OSI-Approved Open Source :: GNU General Public License version 2.0 (GPLv2)

environment.fullpath: User Interface :: Grouping and Descriptive Categories (UI) :: Project is a remote control application
environment.fullname: Project is a remote control application
